productData.displayName: Polaroid Snap Touch Instant Digital Camera
productData.shortDescription: Capture every moment with the Polaroid Snap Touch Instant Digital Camera. Smartphone compatible, this Bluetooth enabled camera prints 2" x 3" full color photos and has burst and photo booth modes, HD videos and selfies to make your photos memorable.
productData.longDescription:
Capture every moment with the Polaroid Snap Touch Instant Digital Camera. Smartphone compatible, this Bluetooth enabled camera prints 2" x 3" full color photos and has burst and photo booth modes, HD videos and selfies to make your photos memorable.

  • 13 MP photos
  • 1080p/720p video
  • Cool touch screen display with 3.5" LCD viewfinder
  • Bluetooth-enable camera integrates printing App for IOS and Android smartphones
  • Photo booth and burst modes
  • Built-in microphone and speaker
  • HD videos
  • Automatically prints 2" x 3" photos
  • MicroSD memory card slot
  • WiFi enabled
  • Rechargeable lithium-ion battery
  • Measures 6.2" D x 5.8" W x 6.9" H
  • Measures 3.8" L x 3.8" W x 5.62" H
  • 1-year manufacturer's warranty
  • Imported
  • Model POLSTR Red; POLSTW White; POLSTPR Purple; POLSTBP Blush; POLSTBL Blue; POLSTB Black
